humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest size of the infiltrating ductal carcinoma is 4.0 cm. According to the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for breast cancer is based on the size of the tumor. In this report, it is stated that the 'INFILTRATING DUCTAL CARCINOMA is 4.0 CM'. This indicates that the tumor is larger than 2 cm but not larger than 5 cm, which corresponds to T3 stage in the TNM staging system.
